text: Toss {{stew_beef}} with {{flour}} and {{seasoned_salt}} until evenly coated.
Heat {{olive_oil}} in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Brown the coated beef, stirring as needed; it does not need to cook through.
Transfer the beef to the slow cooker. Add {{potatoes}}, {{carrots}}, {{onion}}, {{garlic}}, and {{bay_leaf}}.
Add {{black_pepper}}, then pour in {{beef_broth}} and stir in {{tomato_paste}} and {{worcestershire}}.
Cover and cook on LOW for 8–10 hours or HIGH for 4–6 hours, until the beef and vegetables are tender.
Remove the {{bay_leaf}}. Stir in {{peas}} and season with {{salt}} to taste before serving.
